statements: DELETE FROM AssetUtilization WHERE asset_id = 100 AND asset_name = 'Asset1';
DELETE FROM AssetUtilization WHERE utilization_rate > 80 AND last_utilization_date < '2022-01-01';

DELETE FROM utilization_log WHERE asset_id = 2001 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';

DELETE FROM allocation_data WHERE allocation_id = 200 AND allocated_quantity >= 10;
